0.name: Default Group
0.goal: Groups this session's stages together until we have groups.

prompts.message: First Client: Describe your challenge (1 mins)
Client: turn off the camera and listens to the consultants | Consultants: discuss suggestions, ideas or alternative perspectives (5 mins)
Client: turn camera on again and share key insights of learning (1min)

0.name: Troika
0.description: Get immediate practical and resourceful help from your colleagues.
